summary.title: Designed for Everyday Living
summary.subtitle: A thoughtfully planned community that balances comfort, connectivity, and long-term value
summary.tagline: Where location, layout, and lifestyle come together
summary.description:
Provident Sunworth City â€“ The City of More
 
 Provident Sunworth City is a 60-acre integrated township located off Mysore Road near the NICE Junction, offering a rare blend of scale, greenery, and seamless connectivity in South Bengaluru. With Challaghatta Metro Station nearby and easy access to NICE Road, the township ensures convenient connectivity to key parts of the city.
 
 Designed as a self-sustained community, the project features expansive green spaces, thoughtfully planned homes, and everyday conveniences within the premises. Offering well-designed 2 & 3 BHK homes, extensive lifestyle amenities, an in-campus school, and retail spaces, Provident Sunworth City is ideal for families seeking a balanced, future-ready township lifestyle.
highlights: Located off Mysore Road near NICE Junction
Challaghatta Metro Station in close proximity
19 acres of green open spaces with over 7,000 trees
